channel.title: Making monsters give you experience for killing them
channel.description: Hey how do i make monsters give you experience for killing them? Whenever i do it via the npchandler whenyou attack the monster you lagg out. Help?

item.description:
@system wrote:

Hey how do i make monsters give you experience for killing them?
Whenever i do it via the npchandler whenyou attack the monster you lagg out.
